Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a three-run homer in the ninth inning to stun the Brewers.
Post-Match Reflections: Mets manager Carlos Mendoza praised his team's resilience and continued belief.
Alonso was doused with champagne and beer, and his teammates chanted 'Pete! Pete! Pete!' in celebration.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets move on to face the Phillies.
The game ended in a stunning ninth-inning comeback by the Mets.
